name: telepathy

effect.black_white: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.

short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

flavor_text.black_white: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
